content.detail: Onboarded and shepherded the launch of two Press Sites managed by Disney Marketing Teams in Brazil and Latin America. Trained the team's site producers on how to utilize the out-of-box tools provided through the proprietary CMS that I am product manager for. Coordinated the launch of this site with our infrastructure team. I also ensured that the site was set up for accessible standards and was localized per region based on available CMS tools.

images.alt: Homepage of different content links for Disney Latin America Press site
Homepage of different content links for Disney Brazil Press site
